name: Free the Radical Album Cover Artwork Collection

metadata.name: Gamma Album Cover Artwork
metadata.description:
Artwork Notes
The cover artwork was generated in Carrara 3D, using a combination of organic tree structures superimposed with projections of violet and pink textures.

Album Notes
In 2012 I went on a road trip for most of the year and traveled up the eastern sea board of Australia. A big goal of the trip was to produce an album on the road. Part of my process was about being inspired to create tracks based on the environment I was visiting, and not move on from that location till the track was locked away. Applying that kind of discipline was good because it meant I returned from my journey with an album of finished material.

I am not much into photographs and did not take a camera with me, instead the Gamma album is my impressionistic sonic record of my journey. When I listen to it, the memories come rushing back through me, in the same way that you would get if you were looking through a photo album.
